Text:
thankx......
can u upload the short movies of 'The hire'
starring clive owen......i think there r 8 movies in the series...

@sanyam: Thanks. I watched it and it is better than expected.

@kanha: You asked once, five hours ago. I have searched and found all short films. Now, I must encode all, and when they can be upped depends on many things. Please, be patient.
once again looking for Treme - is there an easy way for me to search for the [quark] versions?

@maniaq77: Up to sixth episode Treme was encoded as [quark]. As I answered to you last week, with departure of [quark] Treme is gone too. Older (1-6) episodes still exist, but I guess torrents are dead by now.
Maybe someone good would upload 1-6 on MU or on some other free file-hosting site and send that links to anyone who is interested and left here some junk-mail address.
